room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: What a great and challenging escape room. We did Sherlock Holmes. Well worth it and a great time with a group of family or friends. This is the third one I've done and the most challenging and thought-out escape room I've done. Enjoyed it!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: We made it out alive! The Sherlock room was a lot of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: This was our first escape room experience and we had a blast!! Loved how they decorated the Sherlock Holmes room, paying attention to a lot of detail. Would highly recommend!
